metadata.title: CVE-2020-25340 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in NFStream 5.2.0. Because some allocated modulesare not correctly freed, if the nfstream object is directly destroyedwithout being used after it is created, it will cause a memory leak thatmay result in a local denial of service (DoS).

criterions.comment: ndpi package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
